short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes facebook crap from certain games such as War Commander; and make it unscrollable like you're in a full screen mode.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Removes Facebook crap from certain games such as War Commander; and make it unscrollable like you're in a full screen mode.
Tired of seeing all Facebook ads instead of your game?
Tired of mad scroll working sometimes which scrolls down to the bottom of page?


This extension removes the Facebook Header and right apps bar or the right side bar from certain games, giving you a more full screen mode.
